attributes.action: Make coronavirus testing available for all UK population.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to make coronavirus testing for everyone available in the UK because people don't fully know what the symptoms are, and if they could be infected.

These needs to include if a person as also had the virus so we can test and analyse the amount of people more throughly, and that GPs and hospital staff aren't diagnosing the symptoms as flu, when the symptoms are varied and wider, such as swollen glands and digestive pain.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make coronavirus testing available to all of the UK population because as a Health Care Worker I have been seeing symptoms of this coronavirus in the U.K. as far back as December 2019.
